name: com.gamelovers.googlesheetimporter
author: Miguel Tomas
description:
This package provides a tool to import GoogleSheet data into ScriptableObject persistent config data.

To help configure the GoogleSheet Import data you need to create a configuration ScriptableObject by:
- Right Click on the Project View > Create > ScriptableObjects > Editor > GoogleSheetImporter.
- You can import all the GoogleSheet data without a ScriptableObject by clicking in Tools > Import Google Sheet Data

samples.description: This sample shows how to use different types of google sheet importers
